name: Ghost Lantern (Gerard Balaguer Gurrera)
description:
Prototype phase: Pre-Alpha

Ghost Lanter, is a survival horror game in first person. You are a priest trapped in a church, Your objective will be pass the two red doors, to go out to the real world, but take care, they are following to you!!

Follow us on Twitter to see the evolution:

@HiddenGlowGames

Mail: moonlightgamedev@gmail.com

Beta: 12 April
